plot: At Christmas, Melinda deals with the ghost of a man with a white beard, a round belly, and a jolly laugh.

Businessman William Taylor seems targeted by a ghost, who sabotages his Christmas gifts and calls himself Santa. The ghost claims he only aims to make William spend quality time with doting son Riley, but the blame lies with his adulterous mother. The ghost himself is confused, with a relevant identity hidden from himself.—KGF Vissers
